channel.title: CVE Feed for Tinfoil -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tinfoil -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-43177|2024-08-04T03:47:13.623Z -- tinfoil -- devise-two-factor
item.description: As a result of an incomplete fix for CVE-2015-7225, in versions of devise-two-factor prior to 4.0.2 it is possible to reuse a One-Time-Password (OTP) for one (and only one) immediately trailing interval. CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N)
